description.description: A platform for anonymously connecting victims and survivors of sexual assault who have the same perpetrator

bodyArticle.raw: {"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Problem","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"heading-1"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Every 73 seconds, an American is sexually assaulted.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"However, only 1 in 4 of sexual assaults are reported to the police. Victims and survivors often feel isolated and unsure of who to speak to or what to do. Although 51% of alleged rapists are repeat offenders that have been convicted previously, in many cases victims and survivors of a perpetrator are not aware of other incidents from the same person. This further isolates them, discouraging them from taking action.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Solution","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"heading-1"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Nova is working with iiDecide to create an app for sexual assault survivors and victims, allowing them to log incidents of harassment, threats, and abuse. Reports are automatically matched, and following a few verification steps, users will have the opportunity to anonymously connect with other victims of the same perpetrator.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Creating these connections will empower users, providing them with information, support and confidence as they consider their next steps.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Progress","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"heading-2"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Throughout Fall 2020 and Winter 2021, Nova has designed and developed a preliminary prototype of the app, undergoing multiple design iterations to refine the app's flow. We've sorted through many of the challenges associated with developing an anonymous platform.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"In Spring, we are hoping to improve our matching algorithm and wrap up feature development to have a beta-testable prototype by June.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}
